text:
Is Khloe Kardashian trying to upstage new princess Meghan Markle?

On the latest episode of the popular podcast Straight Shuter!, host Rob Shuter reveals the reality star's desperate to literally follow in Markle's footsteps .

"Like everybody else, Khloe watched the royal wedding on TV and thought it was spectacular," a source told Shuter. "She is now eyeing up Windsor Castle as a place for her to say 'I do.'"
title: Princess Bride? Khloe Desperate To Get Married At Windsor Castle!
